title: Suppress EofException caused by client terminating REST API request stream early
body:
### Description
Don't log `EofException` when the client disconnects while streaming REST API responses.

Previously this went into Javalin but now that we're streaming we seem to be able to handle it in the default exception handler.

```
2022-06-01 12:57:39.490 | qtp154415291-99           | ERROR | BeaconRestApi                  | Failed to process request to URL http://localhost:19501/teku/v1/beacon/pool/deposits
java.io.UncheckedIOException: org.eclipse.jetty.io.EofException
```
